sub_title: Grand Valley State University Information Technology
title: IT Services Technician
description: Provided technical support to faculty, staff, and students, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and network issues efficiently.#Collaborated with faculty and staff to understand their technology needs and deliver appropriate solutions.#Troubleshot complex technical problems across Windows, macOS, and Linux environments using systematic problem-solving approaches.#Documented technical procedures and contributed to the internal knowledge base to support team consistency.

title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborated with Eli Review and GVSU faculty to design and implement an AI-powered writing feedback microservice using Cohere and Mistral LLMs.#Integrated AWS SQS for asynchronous processing and deployed on GPU-backed infrastructure to enhance automated writing assessment.#Led the Laker Mobile CI/CD Modernization Project, automating iOS app build and deployment using Fastlane.#Created developer onboarding documentation and tutorials for future student engineering teams.
